name: Space Grapple (Cosmic Origin) (Cosmic Origin)
description:
You wake up and are not sure where you are.

You only know one thing: Your ship and passengers are in danger, and only you can rescue them.

Can you make the perilous journey back to your ship before it's too late?

Space Grapple is a project I made in 2020. It is a puzzle game where you use a grapple gun to fling yourself around the stage into the exit portal.
